file_intent: Express router for user management API (CRUD) with validation and auth

responsibility_blocks.description: GET /api/users - fetch paginated user list with admin auth
responsibility_blocks.label: List users with pagination

responsibility_blocks.description: GET /api/users/:id - fetch a user by id with validation and auth
responsibility_blocks.label: Get single user

responsibility_blocks.description: POST /api/users - validate input, enforce uniqueness, hash password, create user
responsibility_blocks.label: Create new user

responsibility_blocks.description: PUT /api/users/:id - update allowed user fields with validation and authorization
responsibility_blocks.label: Update user
